00042 class PQXX_LIBEXPORT TableWriter : public TableStream
00043 {
00044 public:
00045   typedef unsigned size_type;
00046

00048   ~TableWriter();                                                       //[t5]

00052   template<typename IT> void push_back(IT Begin, IT End);               //[t10]
00053   template<typename TUPLE> void push_back(const TUPLE &);               //[t10]

00055   void reserve(size_type) {}                                            //[t9]

00058 
00059   // Copy table from one database to another
00060   TableWriter &operator<<(TableReader &);                               //[t6]

00064   template<typename IT> PGSTD::string ezinekoT(IT Begin, IT End) const; //[t10]

00066 
00067 private:
00068   void WriteRawLine(const PGSTD::string &);
00069 
00070   class FieldConverter
00071   {
00072   public:
00073     FieldConverter(const PGSTD::string &N) : Null(N) {}
00074 
00075     template<typename T> PGSTD::string operator()(const PGSTD::string &S,
00076                                                   T i) const
00077     {
00078       return Apply(S, i);
00079     }
00080 
00081     PGSTD::string operator()(const PGSTD::string &S, const char *i) const;
00082 
00083   private:
00084     static PGSTD::string PGNull() { return "\\N"; }
00085     static void Escape(PGSTD::string &);
00086 
00087     template<typename T> 
00088     inline PGSTD::string Apply(const PGSTD::string &, T) const;
00089 
00090     PGSTD::string Null;
00091   };
00092 };

00097 namespace PGSTD
00098 {
00099 // Specialized back_insert_iterator for TableWriter, doesn't require a 
00100 // value_type to be defined.  Accepts any container type instead.
00101 template<> class back_insert_iterator<pqxx::TableWriter> :              //[t9]
00102         public iterator<output_iterator_tag, void,void,void,void>
00103 {
00104 public:
00105   explicit back_insert_iterator(pqxx::TableWriter &W) : m_Writer(W) {}
00106 
00107   template<typename TUPLE> 
00108   back_insert_iterator &operator=(const TUPLE &T)
00109   {
00110     m_Writer.insert(T);
00111     return *this;
00112   }
00113 
00114   back_insert_iterator &operator++() { return *this; }
00115   back_insert_iterator &operator++(int) { return *this; }
00116   back_insert_iterator &operator*() { return *this; }
00117 
00118 private:
00119   pqxx::TableWriter &m_Writer;
00120 };
00121 
00122 } // namespace

00125 namespace pqxx
00126 {
00127 
00128 template<typename T>
00129 inline PGSTD::string TableWriter::FieldConverter::Apply(const PGSTD::string &S,
00130                                                         T i) const
00131 {
00132   PGSTD::string Field(ToString(i));
00133   return S + ((Field == Null) ? PGNull() : Field);
00134 }
00135 
00136 template<>
00137 inline PGSTD::string 
00138 TableWriter::FieldConverter::Apply<PGSTD::string>(const PGSTD::string &S,
00139                                                   PGSTD::string i) const
00140 {
00141   if (i == Null) i = PGNull();
00142   else Escape(i);
00143   return S + i + '\t';
00144 }
00145 
00146 inline PGSTD::string
00147 TableWriter::FieldConverter::operator()(const PGSTD::string &S,
00148                                         const char i[]) const
00149 {
00150   return Apply(S, PGSTD::string(i));
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 inline void TableWriter::FieldConverter::Escape(PGSTD::string &S)
00155 {
00156   const char Special[] = "\n\t\\";
00157 
00158   for (PGSTD::string::size_type j = S.find_first_of(Special);
00159        j != PGSTD::string::npos;
00160        j = S.find_first_of(Special, j+2))
00161     S.insert(j, 1, '\\');
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 template<typename IT> 
00166 inline PGSTD::string TableWriter::ezinekoT(IT Begin, IT End) const
00167 {
00168   PGSTD::string Line = PGSTD::accumulate(Begin, 
00169                                          End, 
00170                                          PGSTD::string(), 
00171                                          FieldConverter(NullStr()));
00172 
00173   // Above algorithm generates one separating tab too many.  Take it back.
00174   if (!Line.empty()) Line.erase(Line.size()-1);
00175 
00176   return Line;
00177 }
00178 
00179 
00180 template<typename TUPLE> 
00181 inline PGSTD::string TableWriter::ezinekoT(const TUPLE &T) const
00182 {
00183   return ezinekoT(T.begin(), T.end());
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 template<typename IT> inline void TableWriter::insert(IT Begin, IT End)
00188 {
00189   WriteRawLine(ezinekoT(Begin, End));
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 template<typename TUPLE> inline void TableWriter::insert(const TUPLE &T)
00194 {
00195   insert(T.begin(), T.end());
00196 }
00197 
00198 template<typename IT> 
00199 inline void TableWriter::push_back(IT Begin, IT End)
00200 {
00201   insert(Begin, End);
00202 }
00203 
00204 template<typename TUPLE> 
00205 inline void TableWriter::push_back(const TUPLE &T)
00206 {
00207   insert(T.begin(), T.end());
00208 }
00209 
00210 template<typename TUPLE> 
00211 inline TableWriter &TableWriter::operator<<(const TUPLE &T)
00212 {
00213   insert(T);
00214   return *this;
00215 }
